param_schema.title: Lora Scale
param_schema.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.name: lora_weights

param_schema.title: Lora Weights

parameters.name: refine_steps

param_schema.title: Refine Steps

parameters.name: apply_watermark

param_schema.title: Apply Watermark
param_schema.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.name: condition_scale

param_schema.title: Condition Scale
param_schema.description: The bigger this number is, the more ControlNet interferes

parameters.description: The bigger this number is, the more ControlNet interferes
